tool_description: This is a very simple REST API designed to test students' ability to consume external services from their applications.
name: ORT ArqSoft Sizer
title: ORT ArqSoft Sizer

api_list.name: Calculate Dimensions
api_list.description: Calculate package dimensions for a given image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mathifonseca-ort-arqsoft-sizer-v1.p.rapidapi.com/dimensions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mathifonseca-ort-arqsoft-sizer-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mathifonseca-ort-arqsoft-sizer-v1.p.rapidapi.com/dimensions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mathifonseca-ort-arqsoft-sizer-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
